member.name: CERT_PUBLIC_KEY_INFO
member.summary: The CERT_PUBLIC_KEY_INFO structure contains a public key and its algorithm.

member.name: CERT_PUBLIC_KEY_INFO.Algorithm
member.summary: structure that contains the public key algorithm type and associated additional parameters.

member.name: CERT_PUBLIC_KEY_INFO.PublicKey
member.summary: BLOB containing an encoded public key.
